articles.title: Machine Learning
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents:
To be contacted? JL Parouty, L. Jacob (plus math)
Have a look also to [wikistat][https://github.com/wikistat] (Insa Toulouse, but in french)
Name
Description
Links
Machine Learning for Ecology and Sustainable Natural Resource Management
Grant Humphries, Dawn R. Magness, Falk Huettmann

A translucent box: interpretable machine learning in ecology
Tim C. D. Lucas

Applications for deep learning in ecology
Sylvain Christin, Éric Hervet, Nicolas Lecomte

Deep learning as a tool for ecology and evolution
Borowiec et al.

Machine learning to classify animal species in camera trap images: Applications in ecology
Tabac et al.

A practical guide to machine learning in ecology
blog by Jon Lefcheck

Deep Learning for Ecology
brief overview of the applications of deep learning to ecology and remote sensing by P. Gray

In-depth introduction to machine learning in 15 hours of expert videos
Trevor Hastie and Rob Tibshirani, 2014

Machine Learning Mastery
A site including tutorial for machine learning from beginners to advanced levels
